Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

OOC:  Most of the damage is around the lower hull of the ship.  It consists of small fractures and breaches, a few moderately large holes.  A section of hull that is the back wall of Hellplague's room is ripped open, exposing it to the weather some, and ther is a hole in the wall in the storage room, about ankle high on the wall.

rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:Celeron wondered what Hellplague was doing with the computer, but it
didn't concern him, so he continued with his work.

His first step in accessing the damage would be to see how deep the
ship had been buried.  Since it was not a huge ship, Celeron didn't
think it would be too deeply buried.  He then determined what type of
soil/rock was under the ship.  After that he began inspecting the
actual damage to the ship...

OOC: Could someone respond to Celeron's work, possibly give a
description of the condition of the ship?


On Tue, 21 Dec 2004 12:45:49 -0800 (PST), robert riley
<bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> The femme opened the hatch from her console and let him out.  She kept it
> open until he came back in, when ever that would be.  She continued her work
> on the computer, reorganizing it and freeing up memory.  Malice sure wasn't
> a computer expert, that was evident from the way the computer was set up. 
> It was quite tedious.
> 
> rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> Celeron knew it was going to come to this.  But he needed the work,
> and hadn't been outside in a while (he hoped that the security system
> wouldn't pervent him from going outside), so he took a scanner, nodded
> to Hellplague and headed for the hatch....hoping it would open for
> him.
> 
> On Sat, 18 Dec 2004 22:08:20 -0800 (PST), robert riley
> <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > Hellplague turns around in her chair and faces Celeron.
> >  
> > "If this ship is ever going to fly again, we need it in good flying
> > condition.  Check for major hull damage, and access if you can the
> > possiblity of repairing it enough to fly."
> > 
> > rm2kmidi <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> > Celeron stepped into the room...
> > 
> > "I finished cleaning,  Is there anything else to do?"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > "HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is
> > your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 
> >

> "HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is
